metadata.name: GainForest
metadata.description: GainForest is a non-profit developing impact evaluators, transparency dashboards, and accountability protocols for nature-based assets using DeSci, artificial intelligence, and web3.

metadata.name: GainForest: A Planetary Computer for ReFi
metadata.description: GainForest‚Ñ¢ is a non-profit using AI and decentralized science to measure and reward sustainable nature stewardship. https://links.gainforest.earth

metadata.name: GainForest - Support XPRIZE Rainforest‚Äôs ‚ÄúSingle Most Impactful Approach/Technology‚Äù
metadata.description: GainForest is co-lead of BioDivX, the XPRIZE Rainforest bonus prize award winner recognized as the ‚Äúsingle most impactful approach/technology‚Äù. GainForest has worked with over 25 communities to bring crucial biodiversity data onchain, distributing $32K in conservation data income to local communities in 2024 for their role in recording crucial forestation and wildlife information, and co-hosted 13 workshops with local communities across 3 countries. GainForest is fostering global climate action through capacity building with local communities and scientists, maintaining a public database of AI+Environment models. By purchasing this hypercert, you are supporting the teams‚Äô work on the ground to protect the world‚Äôs rainforests and incentivize local participation in climate initiatives.

GainForest has worked with over 28 communities to bring crucial biodiversity data onchain, distributing $32K in conservation data income to local communities in 2024 for their role in recording crucial forestation and wildlife information, and co-hosted 13 workshops with local communities across 3 continents. GainForest is fostering global climate action through capacity building with local communities and scientists, maintaining a public database of AI+Environment models. By purchasing this hypercert, you are supporting the teams‚Äô work on the ground to protect the world‚Äôs rainforests and incentivize local participation in climate initiatives.  This is a special Celo x GainForest celebration edition.

data.comments: Collaborated with GainForest to get this baby minted
The Hypercerts Foundation hereby verifies this hypercert, including the work it represents and its creation by GainForest via gainforestmrv.eth.

data.title: Compilation of Bonus Prize Award Announcements
data.description: This attestation compiles official announcements and documentation verifying the receipt of the XPRIZE Rainforest Bonus Prize.
